name: The NeverBeginning Story of How the Video Game Known as Bobzim's Journey Miraculously Came to Life
name_original: The NeverBeginning Story of How the Video Game Known as Bobzim's Journey Miraculously Came to Life
description:
Find out how Hermin created Bobzim's Journey, what tools she used and who participated!

This game was created for the Alternative Ecologies Jam, as part of the Now Play This Festival 2021.

Credits:

Dyna - Art & Device concepts

Ramo - Program & Game Design

The game uses Evert Bloemsma's Cocon typeface, and royalty-free sounds from the BOOM library.
